titles.title: Targeting Homeland Security Resources Effectively Against Terrorism Act of 2009
THREAT Act
To authorize the grant program under which the Secretary of Homeland Security makes discretionary grants for use in high-threat, high-density urban areas, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Homeland Security.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Emergency Communications, Preparedness, and Response.

term.name: Urban and suburban affairs and development
